About Me

Let me tell you a few things about Me...

BIO

Igor de Carvalho, was born in 19 March,1996, at the Loving City of Rio De Janeiro, Son of Claudio Carvalho and Inacia Almeida. My time at Rio was "cut short" coming to Cape-Vert eight months later. Soon developed a taste for computers and sticked to it. My teenage years were spent at Miraflores High School, and after that went to study abroad in Portugal at Instituto Politecnico de Setubal, but returning to Cape-Vert to soon finish my studies at Universidade Jean Piaget.
